messages.title: The Future
messages.content: Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve. A Liberal Democrat government will build a country where every single person and community is valued, empowered and cared for. We will end the Brexit mess, and we will protect our planet for future generations.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025. We will plant 60 million trees every year to cover 1 million hectares by 2045.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Every Child the Best Start in Life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If Brexit happens, we will not have money to focus on the NHS, Education, Social Care, or tackling the climate crisis. Without a strong economy, we can't make the improvements that we desperately need.

issues.brexitEurope: Jeremy Corbyn will lose the election. Boris Johnson can't be trusted. Invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
issues.economy: Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives. Make big companies pay more taxes, invest in British businesses, workers and families, tackle inequality.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
issues.environment: Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025. We will plant 60 million trees every year to cover 1 million hectares by 2045.
issues.health: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

community.content: Tackle the under-funding and cuts to our local schools, NHS, police force and other vital public services. Invest in green technology to create new jobs and tackle the climate emergency.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm campaigning to stop Brexit, because I believe we will be thrown into economic disarray in the event of a bad deal, or a no-deal Brexit. If Brexit happens, we will not have money to focus on the NHS, Education, Social Care, or tackling the climate crisis. Without a strong economy, we can't make the improvements that we desperately need. I am by nature an optimist, and what gives me each day of our life is a hope that together we can build a brighter future.

endorsements.endorser: Conservative MPs Ken Clarke and Michael Heseltine
endorsements.endorsement: Moderate conservatives speak out. Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit.

quotes.text: 'Both Tories and Labour have failed the country'
'British politics is falling apart – the Tories are to blame, but Labour is also a shambles'
